reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is engaging and makes complex concepts easy to understand, but her grading can be strict.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson is excellent! His passion for math is evident, and his lectures are always clear and well-organized.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Chen knows her stuff, but the pace of the class can be overwhelming. Additional resources are helpful.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is very knowledgeable and provides real-world examples, although the class can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: American History
reviews.review: Dr. Patel makes history come alive with her storytelling and deep insights into historical events.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are often disorganized, and he sometimes struggles to answer student questions.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. White is very approachable and provides clear explanations, though the exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Computer Science Basics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's teaching style is a bit dry, but he covers all the necessary material. Extra practice is needed.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is fantastic! Her lectures are interactive and she encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is passionate about the subject and provides useful fieldwork experiences, though the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is knowledgeable, but her grading can be inconsistent and her expectations unclear.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson has a great sense of humor and makes philosophical concepts accessible, though some topics can be confusing.

reviews.subject: Modern Art
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an incredible teacher who has a deep understanding of modern art and inspires creativity in her students.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez's explanations are often unclear and he doesn't provide enough examples for the material.

reviews.subject: Microbiology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is thorough and detailed in her teaching, but the lab work can be quite intensive.

reviews.subject: Digital Media
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is knowledgeable about the field, but his lectures can be repetitive and lack depth.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is amazingâ€”she is very engaging and always available for help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Financial Accounting
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is very effective at explaining complex accounting principles and provides useful real-life examples.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is well-versed in the material, but her lectures can be dry and lack interaction.

reviews.subject: Engineering Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is enthusiastic about the subject and his problem-solving approach is very helpful.

reviews.subject: Theology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark provides a deep and thoughtful exploration of theological concepts and encourages lively discussion.
